enemy_camp: ^You are approached by your lieutenant who informs you of a nearby enemy camp. He advises that attacking them at night will be the best option however you understand that this could lead to soldier morale lowering.
^Attack them in the night (Troop Damage +10%, Morale - 150)

c-0: ^You order an attack during the night.
c-1: ^You order an attack during the day.
